about_the_game:
Survive, Build, Escape

You awaken on the shores of a cursed island—a place teeming with colossal human-eating giants and mysterious creatures lurking in the shadows. This is no ordinary survival challenge; this is a fight for your life against nature, monsters, and your own limits.

Key Features:

  • Survival at Its Core: Scavenge for resources, craft tools, and fight to stay alive.

  • Build Your Sanctuary: Construct a base to protect yourself from the dangers that roam the island at night.

  • Explore a Living World: Discover hidden caves, ancient ruins, and other survivors as you piece together the island’s grim story.

  • Face the Giants: Encounter towering monstrosities that hunt you relentlessly.

  • Find Your Escape: Unravel the island's secrets and uncover your path to freedom.

Do you have what it takes to survive the Feral Frontier and escape this island of nightmares?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred)

short_description: Stranded on an island crawling with terrifying creatures, you must survive, build, and uncover its dark secrets. Can you escape before the giants find you?
